      Method checks if the player's score is valid for a top 10 high score entry by comparing the 10th position's score in the high score list pre: none post: nothing happens if the player's score is invalid for a high score.
      void clearEntities()
      Method clears all GameObjects except for the player from the screen and resets their respective lists pre: player != null post: a screen with no walls or enemies retaining the GUI labels and player, emptied entity lists
      void drawLine(double angle, int distance, int steps, int startX, int startY)
      Method draws a line of invisible ray objects and adds them to the ray list using an angle, distance, steps and a start point pre: steps > 0, distance > 0 post: a line drawn with ray objects

        public void generateNewBoard(int numEnemies)

      • checkHighScore

        public void checkHighScore(int score)
        Method checks if the player's score is valid for a top 10 high score entry by comparing the 10th position's score in the high score list pre: none post: nothing happens if the player's score is invalid for a high score. Displays input prompt for user's name if the user has a valid highscore and adds it to the highscore text file in form of username separated by a space and score

      • addHighScores

        public void addHighScores(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> scores)
        Method sorts the score list and adds the players score in accordingly, then adds the score list to the high score text file. pre: a 2d scores list with names and respective scores separated post: the high score text file is updated

      • getHighScores

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getHighScores()
        Method gets the high scores from the text file on to a 2d array. pre: scores in the text file are recorded string user name with no spaces separated by a space and score. post: an array list of the different high score entries

        public void gameOver()
        Method calls the game over dialogue. pre: game stopped post: game over dialogue displayed
